label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "The boy tuned the radio."? Choose one between A and B.
A: The station was playing rock music.
B: The station was coming in with static.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The woman betrayed her friend."? Choose one between A and B.
A: Her friend sent her a greeting card.
B: Her friend cut off contact with her.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "I applied pressure to the cut on my arm."? Choose one between A and B.
A: It healed.
B: It stopped bleeding.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "A crater formed on the moon."? Choose one between A and B.
A: A comet passed by the moon.
B: A comet collided with the moon.

label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The pond froze over for the winter."? Choose one between A and B.
A: People skated on the pond.
B: People brought boats to the pond.

label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "I put coins in the washing machine at the laundromat."? Choose one between A and B.
A: The machine powered on.
B: I ran out of laundry detergent.

label: A
sentence:
Which sentence is the cause of "The woman exaggerated the details of the story."? Choose one between A and B.
A: She wanted attention.
B: She felt shy.

label: B
sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "I clumsily bumped into the stranger."? Choose one between A and B.
A: I ran away.
B: I apologized to him.
